rukus.text: hananim-i ingan-eul changjohasa geomgo mulg-eun jinheulg-eulo mandeusyeossnola
hananim-i tto yeongmaleul changjoha sa geugeos-eun tteugeoun sal-in-ui bul-eul changjohagi ijeon-ila
bola junim-i cheonsadeul-ege naega geomgo mulg-eun heulg-eulo ingan-eul changjohalila malsseum-i iss-eossnola
naega hyeongsang-eul mandeul-eo geuan-e naui yeonghon-eul bul-eoneoh-eul ttae neohuiga geuege bubog halahani
geuleona ibeulliseuneun buboghaneun jajung-e issgileul geojeolhayeossdeola
hananim-i ileusigil ibeulliseu yeo nega buboghaneun jajung-e issji anh neun iyuneun mueos-inyo lago mul-euni
ibeulliseuga malhagil dangsinkkeseo mulg-go geom-eun jinheulg-eulo bich-eun ingan-e ge wae naega buboghayeoya habnikka la go daedabhadeola
geulihayeo hananim-eun myeonglyeonghasyeoss nani geugos eulobuteo nagala neoneun jeojubad-assnola
simpan-ui geunalkkaji neoege jeo juga iss-eulila
ittae ibeulliseuga juyeo buhwal-uigeunalkkaji jeoleul yuyehayeo jusoseo
hananim-i ileusigil nega yu yedoeneunja gaunde iss-eudoe
jijeongdoen geu sigan geunal kkajila hasini
ibeulliseu malhayeossdeola juyeo dangsin-i naleul banghwangtolog hayeossgie jisang-eseo naega geudeul-eul yuhoghayeo geudeul moduleul banghwangke haliyo
geuleona dangsin-ui jinsilhan jongbog deul-eun je-oedoem-ila hamae
hananim-i ileusigil naui seong silhan jungbog-i ganeun gil-i naegelo i leuneun olbaleun gil-ila
sillo neo satan-eun talseonhayeo neo leul ttaleuneun ja oeeneun naui jong eoneunugudo jibae hal su eobsnola
sillo jiog-eun geudeul moduleul wihan yagsogdoen gos-eulo
geugos-eneun ilgobgaeui mun-i iss eumyeo geugeos-eun geudeul joeindeul-e baedang doen gaggag-ui mun-ila
